title: DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver, Power Tool Combo Kit with 2 Batteries and Charger, Yellow/Black (DCK240C2)
descriptions:
Introducing the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver, Power Tool Combo Kit (DCK240C2) - a game-changer for your DIY projects or professional work. This kit includes two powerful tools: a compact and ergonomic 1/2-inch Drill/Driver (model DCD771), and a 1/4-inch Impact Driver (model DCF885).

The DCD771 Drill/Driver features a speed transmission of 0-450-1500 RPM, delivering an impressive motor performance of 300 UWO. Its compact and lightweight design, along with the single sleeve ratcheting chuck and ergonomic handle, offers comfort and control for those long jobs.

Next, the DCF885 Impact Driver boasts a 1-handed loading 1/4-inch hex chuck that accepts 1-inch bit tips, ensuring quick and efficient changes. With its powerful motor and compact design weighing in at just 2.8 lbs, this impact driver is a must-have for any toolbox.

This combo kit comes equipped with two DEWALT 20V Lithium Ion batteries and a charger - ensuring you'll always have the power you need to complete your tasks. The LED foot light on each tool provides superior visibility, even in dimly lit areas. Whether it's a wide range of home repair projects or large-scale construction work, this powerful combo kit has got you covered. Make the smart choice and elevate your tool collection with DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit (DCK240C2).

**Advertisement Description:**

Transform your home improvement projects and professional tasks with the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver, Power Tool Combo Kit (DCK240C2). This impressive combo kit includes two powerful tools, a compact and lightweight 1/2-inch Drill/Driver (model DCD771) and a versatile 1/4-inch Impact Driver (model DCF885), both backed by an impressive 20V MAX lithium-ion battery system.

Experience the might of the DCD771 drill/driver, delivering an incredible power output of 300 UWO and featuring a compact, lightweight design for easy maneuverability. Its ergonomic handle ensures comfort and control, while its single sleeve ratcheting chuck accommodates 1/2-inch bits for enhanced versatility.

The DCF885 impact driver boasts an impressive size of just 5.55 inches front to back and a weight of only 2.8 lbs, making it the perfect companion for tight spaces and heavy-duty jobs. The 1-handed loading, 1/4-inch hex chuck accepts 1-inch bit tips, and its powerful impact mechanism delivers maximum torque with ease.

Your purchase includes not only these two mighty tools but also an LED foot light offering superior visibility for those late-night projects. Additionally, the package comes complete with two 20V Lithium Ion batteries and a charger to keep your tools charged and ready for action.

Don't miss out on this powerful, versatile combo kit. With the DEWALT DCK240C2, you'll have everything you need to tackle a wide range of applications with confidence and ease. Order now!

**"Introducing the DEWALT DCK240C2: Your Ultimate Cordless Power Tool Solution!"**

Experience unmatched power and versatility with the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver, Power Tool Combo Kit. Featuring two exceptional tools in one kit - a compact and lightweight 1/2-inch Drill/Driver (model DCD771) and a powerful 1/4-inch Impact Driver (model DCF885) - this combo pack is your go-to solution for a wide range of applications.

With the DCD771 Drill/Driver, enjoy adjustable speed settings from 0 to 1500 RPM and a powerful motor output of 300 UWO. The single sleeve ratcheting chuck allows easy bit changes, while the ergonomic handle ensures superior comfort and control.

The DCF885 Impact Driver boasts a compact design with a 5.55-inch front to back length and weighs just 2.8 lbs. Its 1-handed loading 1/4-inch hex chuck accepts bit tips up to 1 inch in size, making it perfect for various projects around the house or job site.

This impressive combo kit comes complete with two 20V Lithium Ion batteries and a convenient charger. Additionally, both tools are engineered with superior LED foot lights, providing optimal visibility for your work area.

Upgrade your tool arsenal today with the DEWALT DCK240C2 Power Tool Combo Kit â€“ the ultimate combination of power, versatility, and convenience.

**Advertisement:**

Transform your DIY projects and home improvements with the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver, Power Tool Combo Kit (DCK240C2)! This impressive combo kit includes a compact and lightweight DCD771 1/2-inch Drill/Driver, and a powerful and versatile DCF885 1/4-inch Impact Driver.

Featuring DEWALT's superior 20V MAX* lithium-ion technology, the drill/driver boasts an impressive 300 unit watts out (UWO) of power output and a variable speed transmission with three different settings, ranging from 0 to 450 RPM for precision tasks and up to 1500 RPM for faster projects. The impact driver, on the other hand, offers a 2.8-lb weight and a 5.55-inch length for easy maneuverability in tight spaces. Its hex chuck accepts 1-inch bit tips and comes with a convenient 1-handed loading design.

Equipped with three LED lights that provide superior visibility without shadows, the drill/driver's LED foot light offers excellent illumination when working in darker environments. Both tools come with two high-performance 20V MAX lithium-ion batteries for extended use and a convenient charger to keep your projects going strong.

Designed for a wide range of applications, this powerful combo kit is perfect for homeowners, contractors, or anyone in need of reliable, versatile power tools. Order now and take advantage of DEWALT's superior performance and legendary durability!

*Maximum initial battery voltage (measured without a workload) is 20 volts. Nominal voltage is 18.

[Package Contents]: 1x DCD771 20V max 1/2-inch Drill/Driver, 1x DCF885 1/4-inch Impact Driver, 2x 20V Lithium Ion Batteries, 1x Charger.

**Advertisement Description:**

Discover the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver, Power Tool Combo Kit (DCK240C2) - a game-changer for your DIY projects or professional work! This kit includes two powerful tools: a compact and lightweight 1/2-inch Drill/Driver (model DCD771) and a versatile 1/4-inch Impact Driver (model DCF885), both featuring superior ergonomic design for optimal comfort and control.

Equipped with a powerful motor, the Drill/Driver delivers an impressive 300 unit watts out and variable speed transmission with settings ranging from 0 to 1500 RPM. The Impact Driver, in turn, boasts a length of 5.55 inches and a weight of just 2.8 lbs, providing unmatched maneuverability for your most challenging tasks.

Your purchase comes complete with two 20V Lithium Ion batteries for extended use, as well as a convenient charger that ensures you're always ready to tackle the next project. The DCD771 and DCF885 models each come with their unique advantages: single sleeve ratcheting chucks (1/2-inch for Drill/Driver and 1/4-inch hex for Impact Driver), and a 3-LED light ring that delays for 20 seconds to provide superior visibility.

Experience the DEWALT difference with this versatile, easy-to-use combo kit - perfect for various applications at home or on the job site. Order now and join thousands of satisfied customers who have already embraced the power and convenience of DEWALT cordless tools!
